name: Acretia - Guardians of Lian
description:
《synopsis》

After two worlds merged, conflicts that lasted for hundreds of years. Eventually, the flame of destruction slowly ignites in the crack.
Lead your legion on the epic journey to break the chains of hatred to save the world from the primordial darkness.

《features》

■ Authentic turn-based strategic RPG based on the epic story.

As you clear the stage of the world, you will play a role as the protagonist of the epic story.

■ Deeper Strategy With Various Variables

It is turn-based. Random weather changes, the day and night, terrain kind and combination between the hero and the soldier affect outcome of each battle.
Field of view at night will be limited. So, be careful.

■ Attractive Hero Characters

Playable heroes will meet as you progress through the game and join when the time comes.
Use each hero's unique skills to win battles.
Not only most of the illustrations of heroes have their own animation, but also, attractive SD. And as you progress through the story, you can get exclusive equipment.
The dialogue varies depending on the level of favorability, so give gifts obtained at the ‘Summoning Station’ to increase likeability of each hero.

■ Job-changeable Soldiers

Soldiers who have achieved the level requirement can change their job by consuming resources.
After changing job, soldier’s stats will be enhanced, and the appearance will be changed. (Appearance changes will be updated soon)

■ Easy Crafting and Smelting

You can craft and smelt equipment by consuming materials. The success rate is 100%.
Sell equipment to get gold, disassemble it to get materials.
Equipment can be mounted on Heroes.

■ the Airship!

As the story progresses, you can board the Airship.
The airship function as a stronghold and, heroes move around on its deck.
